TITLE: Episode 92 - When the Man Shuts You Down
DESCRIPTION: The Vixens are joined this week by the bar owner who was arrested from his own establishment’s rooftop as he protested NYC’s draconian and authoritarian lockdown policies, Mr. Danny Presti of @MacsPublicHouse. They may have finally managed to shut his business down for the moment, but he did not go down without a fight. Here’s his message on why none of us should either.
